### Call for Proposal: Development of AOS Supporting Technologies
#### Solicitation Number: WS4044173766

**Call Description**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bidders to develop and advance innovative technologies that support the Canadian Space Agency's (CSA) priorities and mission roadmaps. The objective is to develop two (2) priority technologies (PTs) up to the Technology Readiness Level 6 (TRL 6).

**Contract Requirements**

The Contractor must provide and deliver a detailed scope of work outlined in the Annex A - Statement of Work. The period of the contract is up to 21 months.

**Proposal Requirements**

Bidders must submit their proposal electronically through SAP Ariba (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16805802). Please note that all supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by November 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Contracting Entity Information**

* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* Contact Person: Anca Jurca (anca.jurca@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Scope of Work**

* Development and advancement of two (2) priority technologies (PTs) supporting the Canadian Space Agency's (CSA) priorities and mission roadmaps
* Work will be conducted up to the Technology Readiness Level 6 (TRL 6)
* See Annex A - Statement of Work for detailed scope of work

**Period of the Contract**

* Up to 21 months

**Procedures**

* Bidders must submit their proposal through SAP Ariba (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16805802)
* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by November 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* Late submissions will be declared non-responsive

**Selection Criteria**

The evaluation will be based on the selection criteria outlined in the solicitation. The combined rating of technical merit and price will be used to evaluate the proposals. More information can be found in the Annex C - Evaluation and Selection.
